description.ko: 백색광이 찬란한 스펙트럼으로 갈라지는 광학 물리학의 매혹적인 아름다움을 탐구합니다. PRISM-2는 투명한 유리를 통해 빛이 분산되는 정밀한 순간을 포착합니다.
description.en: Explore the mesmerizing beauty of optical physics as white light splits into a brilliant spectrum. PRISM-2 captures the precise moment of chromatic dispersion through high-clarity glass.

prompt: A high-quality cinematic shot of a triangular glass prism dispersing a beam of white light into a vibrant rainbow spectrum, intricate light rays, caustic patterns on a clean minimalist background, 8k resolution, ray tracing, optical physics.
